price: 5 tandis que les pieux croyants se délecteront d’un vin mêlé de camphre,
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارَ يَشۡرَبُونَ مِن كَأۡسٖ كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا كَافُورًا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: inna al-abrāra yashrabūna min kasin kāna mizājuhā kāfūran
